scripts.build: microbundle src/index.js -o dist/hooks.js --jsx React.createElement --no-pkg-main -f modern --sourcemap false --no-compress --define process.env.NODE_ENV=production --name iosioHooks
scripts.iosio: npm uninstall @iosio/util @iosio/react-router search-worker && npm install @iosio/util search-worker && npm install @iosio/react-router --save-dev
